data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese*, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Polish*, Greek
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 280 / ATI Radeon HD 5800 / Intel HD 5000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 7, Win 8.1, Win 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 / ATI Radeon HD 9700
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 280 / ATI Radeon HD 5800 / Intel HD 5000
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 / ATI Radeon HD 9700
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu-Linux 12.04 LTS, 12.10 and 14.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 280 / ATI Radeon HD 5800 / Intel HD 5000
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OSS compatible sound card
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu-Linux 12.04 LTS, 12.10 and 14.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 / ATI Radeon HD 9700
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OSS compatible sound card
